name: Space Escaper
description:
Overview

  • There are only some limited resources left in your aircraft, use these resources to escape the enemy's pursuit.
  • A training system in the aircraft with different levels, challenge the levels to train your control ability and collect coins to upgrade the aircraft.
  • After defeat enemy during training/combat, some useful gems/coins will drop. These gems have different uses to help you survive in space, and the coins can be used to upgrade the aircraft.
  • Different abilities to help defeat powerful enemy

How to Use different weapon to defeat enemies

  • Different gems drops from enemies help you survive in space

  • Collect coins to upgrade your abilities to help defeat powerful enemy

  • You cannot stop the ship, but you can disable the engine of the aircraft that move slowly and missiles don't trace the ship

  • Magnetic field changes direction/rebound attack from enemy

  • Gravity field slows down the attack/object that the ship can avoid them

  • Trap pulls surrounding object to its centre

  • Shield can block attack and rebound laser type attack

  • Fuel boost the ship

  • Bomb clear enemies around the aircraft
